page.title: 19CHALFONT ST PETER VILLAGE
page.content: Chalfont St. Peter is a thriving village, with many local activities taking place throughout the year. The church is obviously the centre of much activity, having strong links with the local Middle School. Each year the school and church jointly organise a summer fete, and the proceeds are halved. The local Community Centre hosts main activities such as a Red Cross Group, dance classes, local music festivals etc. The St. Peter Players, an amateur dramatic society, also use the centre for some of their productions. The village has a library, this too works in conjunction with local schools. The Middle School sometimes organises class trips to see how a library is run. The village boasts many shops within the main shopping street, the Market Place and a seperate shopping precinct.
